legal_basis: Section 5(1) of the Patented Medicines (Notice of Compliance) Regulations
cause_of_action: AstraZeneca challenged Health Canada's decision allowing Apotex to produce a generic version of LOSEC without addressing certain patents
procedure_followed: Judicial review application assessed the Minister's interpretation of regulations and procedural fairness
decision_reasoning: The Minister found that marketing must occur after patent listing, which AstraZeneca failed to prove post-1996
